channel.title: [PI] Lunar Spellbook
channel.description:
hello, i added the lunar things on the server side but when i click the altar of guthix and i click the spellbook it freezes, i am pretty sure that i need to add the interface or something to the client side. if someone could help me that would be GREAT i have only been coding project insanity base for about half a day but i have been coding delta for a few weeks but i am still new at it.
P.S heres the code when it dces [code]Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.drawInterface(client.java:8274) at client.drawTabArea(client.java:1893) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8149) at client.processDrawing(client.java:8897) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:4686) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]

item.title: [PI] Lunar Spellbook
item.dc:creator: @vamp256 vamp256
item.description:
@vamp256 wrote:

Yeah, you gotta add an interface client-sided.

Read full topic
